variables.label: Umami Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/umami/umami/tags

instructions.end: Umami has been deployed! Visit http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain to set up analytics. Default login is admin/umami.

description: Privacy-focused web analytics. Simple, fast, and privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics.
